channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m a single parent in my 50s. Should I add my adult children, 23 and 29, to my mortgage loan to help me qualify?
item.description: “I want to purchase a family home so we three don’t have to pay rent.”

item.title: I’m 67. My wife, 48, is financially illiterate. How do I teach her to manage our money? After all, I won’t be around forever.
item.description: “We have a 12-year-old daughter. I have $1.1 million in a traditional IRA and $250,000 in cash.”

item.title: ‘It’s keeping me up at night’: My brother sold his share of the family farm and lost the rest in a divorce. He says I owe him.
item.description: “He told me that he will legally pursue me and my farm through the court.”

item.title: Fed governor Cook declared second residence as ‘vacation home,’ countering Trump’s claims
item.description: Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook reportedly declared a condo she purchased in 2021 as a “vacation” and “second” home in loan filings and other docum...

item.title: My boyfriend, 69, moved in. He refuses to pay more than $1,300 in rent and won’t do yard work. What should I do?
item.description: “It’s clear that he seems to think that if I die, that he should inherit the house. That is NOT my plan.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
